translated: Therefore, because the cause, light, is not mistaken with regard to the observed effect, form, there is ascertainment of simultaneous observation.

original: de nyid snang ba dang gzugs dag ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de nyid snang ba dang gzugs dag ces bya ba smos te /
translated: He says just that:

original: gzugs dang snang ba dang lhan cig pa nyid gzung ba'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gzugs dang snang ba dang lhan cig pa nyid gzung ba'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur gyi /
translated: The simultaneity of form and light would be the characteristic of the object of apprehension.

original: lhan cig ma yin pa ni mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhan cig ma yin pa ni mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But if they are not simultaneous, they are not a cause and effect.

original: yang na de dag lhan cig dmigs par nges pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na de dag lhan cig dmigs par nges pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: Or, it is not certain that they are necessarily perceived simultaneously,

original: gzugs med pa'i snang ba'i nam mkha' 'ba' zhig mthong ba'i phyir dang / byi la sogs pa srog chags kyi bye brag gis mun ba na yang gzugs la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snang ba'i nam mkha' 'ba' zhig mthong ba'i phyir dang / byi la sogs pa srog chags kyi bye brag gis mun ba na yang gzugs la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one sees only the space of the light of the formless realm, and because in the dark, animals such as cats perceive form.

original: lhan cig dmigs par nges pa nyid ma grub par 'dod pas gal te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs par nges pa nyid ma grub par 'dod pas gal te zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Since it is not established that they are necessarily perceived simultaneously, he says, ‚ÄúIf you say that the object is perceived first, because it is the cause of consciousness, and the consciousness is perceived later.‚Äù

original: shes pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dus snga ma yin pas yul ni sngar dmigs la /
analyzed: shes pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dus snga ma yin pas yul ni sngar dmigs la /
translated: The object is perceived first, because it is the cause of consciousness.

original: yul de ni yang dag par myong ba'i shes pa ni phyis dmigs so zhe na /
analyzed: yul de ni yang dag par myong ba'i shes pa ni phyis dmigs so zhe na /
translated: The consciousness that experiences that object is perceived later.

original: dmigs par byed pas dmigs pa ste shes pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs par byed pas dmigs pa ste shes pa'o //
translated: The object is perceived by the consciousness that perceives it.

original: de yul dmigs pa'i dus na rang rig pa'i mngon sum ma yin na /
analyzed: de yul dmigs pa'i dus na rang rig pa'i mngon sum ma yin na /
translated: If the consciousness that perceives the object is not the direct perception that is self-awareness at the time of the perception of the object,

original: yul de mthong ba yang rab tu mi 'grub po //
analyzed: yul de mthong ba yang rab tu mi 'grub po //
translated: then the seeing of that object is not established.

original: yul mthong ba ni ma yin gyi yul yod pa tsam gyis so zhe na /
analyzed: yul mthong ba ni ma yin gyi yul yod pa tsam gyis so zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not the seeing of the object, but the mere existence of the object,

original: yul yod pa tsam gyis yul la shes pas dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yul yod pa tsam gyis yul la shes pas dmigs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the mere existence of an object is perceived by consciousness.

original: 'on kyang yul de la dmigs pa'i shes pa yod pas so //
analyzed: 'on kyang yul de la dmigs pa'i shes pa yod pas so //
translated: But rather, it is because there is a consciousness that perceives that object.

original: shes pa de yang rang rig pa'i tshad mas grub pa ma yin pas bden pa'i rgyu mtshan can te /
analyzed: shes pa de yang rang rig pa'i tshad mas grub pa ma yin pas bden pa'i rgyu mtshan can te /
translated: And that consciousness is not established by the valid knowledge of reflexive awareness, so it is not a true object.

original: tshad ma'i rgyu can gyi yul dmigs pa'i tha snyad mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: tshad ma'i rgyu can gyi yul dmigs pa'i tha snyad mi 'grub bo //
translated: The convention of perceiving an object that is the cause of valid knowledge is not established.

original: shes pa de ma grub na de yul yang yod par mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: shes pa de ma grub na de yul yang yod par mi 'grub ste /
translated: If that consciousness is not established, then the object is not established as existent.

original: mi rtogs pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i bye brag sna tshogs ni nus par te mi rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rtogs pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i bye brag sna tshogs ni nus par te mi rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is not cognized, the various types of beings would not be cognized.

original: gal te yul dmigs pa'i shes pa phyis byung ba gzhan gyis yang dag par myong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yul dmigs pa'i shes pa phyis byung ba gzhan gyis yang dag par myong ngo zhe na /
translated: If it is said that a later consciousness that perceives the object experiences it,

original: de lta na yul de ji srid bdag nyid dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: de lta na yul de ji srid bdag nyid dmigs pa ste /
translated: then the object would not be established as long as it is perceived by itself,

original: rang gi rnam par shes pas gzung @201a * //üîΩbar rung ba'i tshe na mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: rang gi rnam par shes pas gzung @201a * //üîΩbar rung ba'i tshe na mi 'grub ste /
translated: that is, as long as it is apprehended by its own consciousness.

original: rang gi shes pa grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / shes pa phyi mas yul las gzhan de'i shes pa'i tshe ni yul de rtogs pa 'grub pas /
analyzed: rang gi shes pa grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / shes pa phyi mas yul las gzhan de'i shes pa'i tshe ni yul de rtogs pa 'grub pas /
translated: Because the consciousness itself is not established, and when the subsequent consciousness is other than the object, the object is not established at the time of the consciousness of that object.

original: yul rang dmigs kyang yul de ma 'grub la /üîΩde las gzhan shes pa dmigs pa'i tshe ni ma 'grub pas ;
analyzed: yul rang dmigs kyang yul de ma 'grub la / de las gzhan shes pa dmigs pa'i tshe ni ma 'grub pas ;
translated: Even though the object is observed, the object is not established.üîΩWhen it is observed by another consciousness, it is not established.

original: rang dmigs pa na ni mi rtogs la gzhan dmigs pa'i tshe rtogs so zhes bya ba phyin ci log go //
analyzed: rang dmigs pa na ni mi rtogs la gzhan dmigs pa'i tshe rtogs so zhes bya ba phyin ci log go //
translated: Therefore it is mistaken to say that when it is observed by itself, it is not cognized, but when it is observed by another, it is cognized.

original: shes pa gzhan gyis myong ba khas blangs te bshad nas /
analyzed: shes pa gzhan gyis myong ba khas blangs te bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the assertion that consciousness is experienced by another consciousness,

original: da ni gzhan gyis myong ba nyid bkag pa'i phyir yang dag par myong ba gzhan zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: da ni gzhan gyis myong ba nyid bkag pa'i phyir yang dag par myong ba gzhan zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: now, in order to refute the experience of another, he says, ‚ÄúCorrect experience is not of another.‚Äù

original: rang rig pa khas mi len na shes pa de phyi ma de yang mi dmigs pa nyid yin pas de yang rang gis mi 'grub pas /
analyzed: rang rig pa khas mi len na shes pa de phyi ma de yang mi dmigs pa nyid yin pas de yang rang gis mi 'grub pas /
translated: If autocognition is not accepted, that consciousness is not observed by another, and therefore it is not established by itself.

original: rang yang dag par myong bsgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang yang dag par myong bsgrub par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore it does not establish the correct experience of itself.

original: rang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dmigs pa gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang ba ste /
analyzed: rang rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dmigs pa gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang ba ste /
translated: In order to understand itself, it would follow another object.

original: de yang ltos par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang ltos par 'gyur ro //
translated: And that would also be dependent.

original: dmigs pa gsum pa de yang gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rim gyis dmigs pa'i mtha' rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa gsum pa de yang gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rim gyis dmigs pa'i mtha' rtogs pa'o //
translated: And that third object would be understood through the process of following another object.

original: shes pa rang rig pa yin na /
analyzed: shes pa rang rig pa yin na /
translated: If consciousness were reflexive awareness,

original: de nyid kyi yul yang rig pa des na shes pa dang de yul lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa 'grub ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi yul yang rig pa des na shes pa dang de yul lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa 'grub ste /
translated: then that very object would be known by that very awareness. Thus the ascertainment that consciousness and its object are simultaneously apprehended would be established,

original: yul dang shes pa gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir de 'grub pa nyid kyis de yang grub pa'i phyir rim gyis dmigs bar byed ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang shes pa gcig nyid yin pa'i phyir de 'grub pa nyid kyis de yang grub pa'i phyir rim gyis dmigs bar byed ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object and consciousness would be identical. Since that is established, it is established by that very thing. Therefore it is contradictory that they are serially apprehended.

original: de grub pas grub pa yang de dag bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de grub pas grub pa yang de dag bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since that is established, that which is established is not different from them.

original: de ltar na rig par bya ba med pa'i phyir yang dag par rig pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na rig par bya ba med pa'i phyir yang dag par rig pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Thus, because there would be no object of awareness, there would be no awareness.

original: yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ba yang yang dag par rig pa de'i bdag nyid yin pas na rang de ltar gsal ba'o //
analyzed: yang dag par rig pa zhes bya ba yang yang dag par rig pa de'i bdag nyid yin pas na rang de ltar gsal ba'o //
translated: Also, ‚Äúcorrect cognition‚Äù is the nature of that correct cognition, and thus it is clear in that way.

original: gsal ba de rang las gzhan gang gi yang gsal byed ma yin te /
analyzed: gsal ba de rang las gzhan gang gi yang gsal byed ma yin te /
translated: That clarity is not the clarifier of anything other than itself,

original: de'i rig pa'i cha'i bdag nyid rig pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i rig pa'i cha'i bdag nyid rig pa bzhin no //
translated: like the nature of the aspect of cognition.

original: rig pa'i cha de las kyang sngon po'i cha de don gzhan yin par rig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rig pa'i cha de las kyang sngon po'i cha de don gzhan yin par rig pa ma yin no //
translated: Also, from that aspect of cognition, that aspect of blue is not cognized as a different object.

original: sngon po la sogs pa shes pa de'i bdag nyid du gyur pas de ltar gsal ba na'o //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa shes pa de'i bdag nyid du gyur pas de ltar gsal ba na'o //
translated: Since blue, etc., become the nature of that consciousness, it is clear in that way.

original: yang 'khrul pas gnyis su rig pa'i phyir rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid gsal bar byed pa yin te mar me bzhin no //
analyzed: yang 'khrul pas gnyis su rig pa'i phyir rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid gsal bar byed pa yin te mar me bzhin no //
translated: Also, because of error, it is cognized as two, and thus it is the clarifier of itself and another, like a lamp.

original: gzhan yang gsal bar byed pa de'i phyir yul 'dzin pa yang yin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang gsal bar byed pa de'i phyir yul 'dzin pa yang yin la /
translated: Moreover, because it is the clarifier, it is the apprehender of the object,

original: rnam pa yang yin pas 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa yang yin pas 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ste /
translated: and because it is the aspect, it is the aspect of the apprehender.

original: des yang dag @201b par myong ba sgrub par byed pa 'dod do //
analyzed: des yang dag @201b par myong ba sgrub par byed pa 'dod do //
translated: It is asserted that it establishes the experience of that.

original: yul gyi rnam pa de las yul myong ba'i ngo bo de rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa de las yul myong ba'i ngo bo de rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the nature of the experience of the object is posited from the aspect of the object.

original: yul dang 'dra ba med na shes pas de myong ba mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul dang 'dra ba med na shes pas de myong ba mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were not like the object, it would be impossible for consciousness to experience it.

original: yul dang de'i tshad ma bstan pa de la 'dod chags la sogs pa rig pa rnams ni /
analyzed: yul dang de'i tshad ma bstan pa de la 'dod chags la sogs pa rig pa rnams ni /
translated: With regard to the teaching of the object and its valid knowledge, those who know desire and so on

original: rang nyid yul la tshad ma nyid rnam gzhag de ni rang rig pa thams cad la kun du sbyar ro //
analyzed: rang nyid yul la tshad ma nyid rnam gzhag de ni rang rig pa thams cad la kun du sbyar ro //
translated: apply this presentation of valid knowledge to all forms of reflexive awareness.

original: rang rig pa de la yang myong ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang rig pa de la yang myong ba'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And with regard to that reflexive awareness, because it is the nature of experience,

original: de bdag nyid rig par nus pa yin phyir de'i nus pa tshad ma'o //
analyzed: de bdag nyid rig par nus pa yin phyir de'i nus pa tshad ma'o //
translated: it is able to be aware of itself, and therefore its capacity is valid knowledge.

original: bdag nyid gzhal bya rang rig 'bras //
analyzed: bdag nyid gzhal bya rang rig 'bras //
translated: The object of comprehension is reflexive awareness, the result.

original: nus pa zhes bya ba de nyid ci zhe na /
analyzed: nus pa zhes bya ba de nyid ci zhe na /
translated: What is this so-called capacity?

original: 'khrul pa'i rnam pas bsdus pa ste 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i rnam pas bsdus pa ste 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It is included within the aspect of error and has the nature of apprehension.

original: de yang bdag nyid yongs gcod de bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: de yang bdag nyid yongs gcod de bdag nyid 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: And it is the determination of itself, characterized by the apprehension of itself.

original: bdag nyid gcod pas nus pas nus pa zhes kyang yongs gcod ces bya ba la sogs pa'i ming du slob dpon gyis mdzad do //
analyzed: bdag nyid gcod pas nus pas nus pa zhes kyang yongs gcod ces bya ba la sogs pa'i ming du slob dpon gyis mdzad do //
translated: The master has also used the terms ‚Äúability‚Äù and ‚Äúdetermination‚Äù in such passages as ‚Äúbecause of the ability to cut off the self.‚Äù

original: de ni rang bdag rig pa'i tshad ma'o ;
analyzed: de ni rang bdag rig pa'i tshad ma'o ;
translated: This is the valid cognition of reflexive awareness.

original: / de ni rnam par shes par smra ba dang phyi rol gyi don du smra ba dag gis thun mong du bstan nas /
analyzed: / de ni rnam par shes par smra ba dang phyi rol gyi don du smra ba dag gis thun mong du bstan nas /
translated: This has been taught in common by the proponents of consciousness and the proponents of external objects.

original: phyi rol gyi don du smra ba'i dbang du byas te /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi don du smra ba'i dbang du byas te /
translated: Now, from the perspective of the proponents of external objects,

original: phyi'i don kyang zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: phyi'i don kyang zhes gsungs te /
translated: it is said that ‚Äúexternal objects are also . . .‚Äù

original: de zhes bya ba ni lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa dang rig bar bya ba dag gis so //
analyzed: de zhes bya ba ni lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa dang rig bar bya ba dag gis so //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the ascertainment of simultaneous observation and the object of awareness.

original: phyi'i don kyang lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa rang rig par bya bas zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs dag las ni /
analyzed: phyi'i don kyang lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa rang rig par bya bas zhes bya ba'i gtan tshigs dag las ni /
translated: ‚ÄúExternal objects are also ascertained by the ascertainment of simultaneous observation and reflexive awareness‚Äù is the argument.

original: sngon po la sogs pa blo'i snang ba dang / de rig pa dag tha mi dad par grub po //
analyzed: sngon po la sogs pa blo'i snang ba dang / de rig pa dag tha mi dad par grub po //
translated: From these, it is established that the appearances of consciousness, such as blue, and the awareness of them are not different.

original: blo la snang ba de las gzhan pa phyi rol yod do zhes bya ba gang las she na /
analyzed: blo la snang ba de las gzhan pa phyi rol yod do zhes bya ba gang las she na /
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúWhat is the evidence that external objects exist, which are different from those appearances to the mind?‚Äù

original: mig dang / snang ba dang shes pa dag nus pa'i rgyu gzhan yod kyang /
analyzed: mig dang / snang ba dang shes pa dag nus pa'i rgyu gzhan yod kyang /
translated: Even though there are other causes of the potential of the eye, light, and consciousness,

original: sngon po'i rnam par shes pa grub pa med na /
analyzed: sngon po'i rnam par shes pa grub pa med na /
translated: if the consciousness of blue is not established,

original: rgyu de dag las gzhan zhig mtshang bar rtogs par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: rgyu de dag las gzhan zhig mtshang bar rtogs par bya ba yin la /
translated: it is to be understood that something other than those causes is required.

original: de ni phyi rol gyi don sngon po yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni phyi rol gyi don sngon po yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: That is the external object, blue.

original: ldog bas phyi rol sgrub ba 'dis gang gi tshe rnam par shes par smra ba dag nang gi nye bar len pa'i dngos po'i bye brag gis byas bas 'bras bu sngon po shes pa ldog pa yin par mi smra na phyi rol 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ldog bas phyi rol sgrub ba 'dis gang gi tshe rnam par shes par smra ba dag nang gi nye bar len pa'i dngos po'i bye brag gis byas bas 'bras bu sngon po shes pa ldog pa yin par mi smra na phyi rol 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: This proof of external objects through exclusion: When the Proponents of Consciousness do not say that the effect, the consciousness of blue, is excluded by being produced by a specific internal appropriated factor, then external objects are established.

original: bag chags mi brten pa ni shes pa mtshams sbyor mi nus pa ste /
analyzed: bag chags mi brten pa ni shes pa mtshams sbyor mi nus pa ste /
translated: The non-enduring potential is the inability of consciousness to connect with an object.

original: mthong ba'i shes pa dang phrad pa'i shes pa 'dra bar skyed par mi nus @202a * //
analyzed: mthong ba'i shes pa dang phrad pa'i shes pa 'dra bar skyed par mi nus @202a * //
translated: It is the inability to produce a consciousness that is similar to the consciousness that has encountered the object.

original: pa'o ; / mi mkhas pa ni bstan bcos goms par ma byas pa'o //
analyzed: pa'o ; / mi mkhas pa ni bstan bcos goms par ma byas pa'o //
translated: The unwise are those who have not studied the treatises.

original: gzhan ni tshad ma'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni tshad ma'o //
translated: The other is valid knowledge.

original: bag  chags brtan pa ni mthong ba dang mthun pa'i shes pa'i rgyun skyed par nus pa'o //üîΩ'khor ba kun du ni thams cad mkhyen pha nyid ma thob pa'am /
analyzed: bag  chags brtan pa ni mthong ba dang mthun pa'i shes pa'i rgyun skyed par nus pa'o // 'khor ba kun du ni thams cad mkhyen pha nyid ma thob pa'am /
translated: A stable latent impression is one that is capable of generating a continuum of consciousness that is in conformity with what is seen.

original: mya ngan las 'das par ma zhugs kyi bar du'o //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das par ma zhugs kyi bar du'o //
translated: In samsara means until omniscience itself is attained or until nirvana is entered.

original: mi slu ba dang mi 'bral bar 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi slu ba dang mi 'bral bar 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is engaged in without being deceived and without being separated from.

original: tha snyad ni 'jig rten pa'i grags pa la ltos te'o //
analyzed: tha snyad ni 'jig rten pa'i grags pa la ltos te'o //
translated: Convention is in dependence on what is renowned in the world.

original: gal te 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kyis tshad ma'i mtshan nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad kyis tshad ma'i mtshan nyid yin na /
translated: If the definition of valid knowledge is in terms of what is renowned in the world,

original: 'jig rten nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyir de'i don du bstan bcos rtsom pa don med do zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyir de'i don du bstan bcos rtsom pa don med do zhe na /
translated: since the world itself understands it, it is pointless to compose treatises for that purpose.

original: de lta yin na yang tshad ma'i mtshan nyid 'di la yang pha rol rigs pa can la sogs pa blun po dag mkhas pa'i nga rgyal gyis tha snyad dang 'gal ba'i bstan bcos kyis 'jig rten dag slu bar byed pa dag bsal ba'i phyir tshad ma'i mtshan nyid
analyzed: de lta yin na yang tshad ma'i mtshan nyid 'di la yang pha rol rigs pa can la sogs pa blun po dag mkhas pa'i nga rgyal gyis tha snyad dang 'gal ba'i bstan bcos kyis 'jig rten dag slu bar byed pa dag bsal ba'i phyir tshad ma'i mtshan nyid
translated: Even though that is so, this definition of valid knowledge is also for the purpose of refuting those who are confused about the definition of valid knowledge, such as the logicians, who, through the pride of being learned, deceive the world with treatises that contradict conventions.

original: kyi bstan bcos bya ba ni rigs pa nyid do ;
analyzed: kyi bstan bcos bya ba ni rigs pa nyid do ;
translated: The treatise is called ‚Äúlogic‚Äù because it is the very logic.

original: / tshad ma'i mtshan nyid thams cad tha snyad pa yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: / tshad ma'i mtshan nyid thams cad tha snyad pa yin nam zhe na /
translated: Are all the characteristics of valid cognition conventional?

original: don dam pa'i tshad ma ni thos pa'i don rigs pas bsams pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab goms par byas ba las goms pa yongs su rdzogs na /
analyzed: don dam pa'i tshad ma ni thos pa'i don rigs pas bsams pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab goms par byas ba las goms pa yongs su rdzogs na /
translated: The ultimate valid cognition is the wisdom of the nature arisen from reflection on the meaning of what is heard. When the cultivation of that is complete,

original: tshad ma dag gi don 'dzin pa'i phyir /üîΩrnam par 'khrul pas dben pa /
analyzed: tshad ma dag gi don 'dzin pa'i phyir / rnam par 'khrul pas dben pa /
translated: it apprehends the meaning of the valid cognitions.üîΩIt is free from error.

original: dri ma ni zag pa ste bral ba'o //
analyzed: dri ma ni zag pa ste bral ba'o //
translated: Contaminants are impurities, and it is free from them.

original: de dag nyid kyi slu ba med pa'i phyir bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: de dag nyid kyi slu ba med pa'i phyir bstan pa yin la /
translated: It is taught because it is undeceiving with respect to those.

original: de yang rtags la mi brten par yang dag ba'i don mngon sum du byed pa'o //
analyzed: de yang rtags la mi brten par yang dag ba'i don mngon sum du byed pa'o //
translated: Moreover, it manifests the correct meaning without depending on a reason.

original: tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i 'grel bshad las mngon sum gyi le'u ste dang po'o /
analyzed: tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i 'grel bshad las mngon sum gyi le'u ste dang po'o /
translated: This is the first chapter, on direct perception, from the commentary on the Ascertainment of Valid Cognition.

original: // / mngon sum la ni gzhan gyi don gsal bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: // / mngon sum la ni gzhan gyi don gsal bar mi bya ste /
translated: Direct perception does not clarify the meaning for others,

original: 'di ltar 'di na'o de na'o zhes bya bar zad pas rtogs par sla ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di na'o de na'o zhes bya bar zad pas rtogs par sla ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is easy to understand, as in ‚Äúit is here‚Äù or ‚Äúit is there.‚Äù

original: rang gi don ni shes pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: rang gi don ni shes pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: One‚Äôs own purpose is the nature of knowledge.

original: gzhan gyi don ni brjod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don ni brjod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The other‚Äôs purpose is the characteristic of expression.

original: rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i shes pa the tshom yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i shes pa the tshom yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the knowledge that exists in one‚Äôs own continuum is doubtful,

original: gzhan gyis go bar byed pa ma yin la /
analyzed: gzhan gyis go bar byed pa ma yin la /
translated: it does not cause understanding in others.

original: bdag nyid kyis rtogs zin pa'i don gzhan la brjod pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa bdag nyid kyis go bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis rtogs zin pa'i don gzhan la brjod pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa bdag nyid kyis go bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: And because the meaning that has already been understood by oneself is expressed to others, it is not one‚Äôs own understanding.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa tshul gsum pa nyid du bye brag med pa'i phyir sgra ste gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa logs shig tu @202b brjod par mi bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa tshul gsum pa nyid du bye brag med pa'i phyir sgra ste gzhan gyi don gyi rjes su dpag pa logs shig tu @202b brjod par mi bya'o zhe na /
translated: If inference is not stated separately as the inference of another‚Äôs purpose because the trimodal condition is the same,

original: don gyi bdag nyid kyi tshul gsum ni rtags can go bar byed la /
analyzed: don gyi bdag nyid kyi tshul gsum ni rtags can go bar byed la /
translated: then the trimodal condition of the meaning itself causes understanding of the evidence.

original: rtags can de'i rtags ni tshul gsum pa'i sgra yis go bar byed pas so //
analyzed: rtags can de'i rtags ni tshul gsum pa'i sgra yis go bar byed pas so //
translated: And because the evidence of that evidence is understood by the word‚Äôs trimodal condition,

original: gal te 'jug pa'i bye brag yod kyang sgra'i bye brag gi mtshan nyid logs shig tu smra bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: gal te 'jug pa'i bye brag yod kyang sgra'i bye brag gi mtshan nyid logs shig tu smra bar mi bya ste /
translated: if there is a difference in engagement but the characteristic of the difference in word is not stated separately,üîΩthen the word‚Äôs trimodal condition is not stated separately.

original: rang gi don gyi mtshan nyid gsum rtogs pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: rang gi don gyi mtshan nyid gsum rtogs pa nyid kyis /
translated: Because by understanding the three characteristics of the reason itself,

original: de'i sgras mtshan nyid kyang rtogs pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i sgras mtshan nyid kyang rtogs pa'i phyir te /
translated: one also understands the characteristics of the reason.

original: 'di ltar rtags gang phyogs gang la mthong ba'i bsgrub bar bya ba dang 'brel pa rtogs pa'i rtags de nyid la bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos po rtogs par byed pa zhes brjod la /
analyzed: 'di ltar rtags gang phyogs gang la mthong ba'i bsgrub bar bya ba dang 'brel pa rtogs pa'i rtags de nyid la bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos po rtogs par byed pa zhes brjod la /
translated: Thus, the reason that is seen in a specific subject is understood to be related to the probandum. That very reason is said to make one understand the entity of the probandum.

original: de log bar byed pa rtags kyi mtshan nyid rang gi don gyi bstan bcos las bstan pas /
analyzed: de log bar byed pa rtags kyi mtshan nyid rang gi don gyi bstan bcos las bstan pas /
translated: Since the treatise on the meaning of the reason itself teaches the characteristic of the reason,

original: logs shig tu bstan par 'dod pa'i ngag gi rim pas bstan par byas pa nyid de /
analyzed: logs shig tu bstan par 'dod pa'i ngag gi rim pas bstan par byas pa nyid de /
translated: it is taught by the sequence of words that are asserted to be separate.

original: rtags kyi rang bzhin gsum las gzhan 'dir ma bstan pa brjod pas ni go bar byed pa'i chos gtan tshigs bstan par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtags kyi rang bzhin gsum las gzhan 'dir ma bstan pa brjod pas ni go bar byed pa'i chos gtan tshigs bstan par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because by stating that nothing else is taught here apart from the three natures of the reason, the property of the reason that is to be understood is not taught.

original: de'i phyir ston pa bo gang dag rtags kyi mtshan nyid kyi don gang rtogs pa de smra bar shes pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir ston pa bo gang dag rtags kyi mtshan nyid kyi don gang rtogs pa de smra bar shes pa ste /
translated: Therefore, those who teach the meaning of the characteristic of the reason understand what is to be stated.

original: lkugs pa la sogs pa ma yin pa'i smra ba'i tshig de nyid rtags kyi mtshan nyid rtogs par byed pa'i brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: lkugs pa la sogs pa ma yin pa'i smra ba'i tshig de nyid rtags kyi mtshan nyid rtogs par byed pa'i brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: The words of the statement are not mute, etc. That statement is the expression that causes one to understand the definition of the reason.

original: mtshan nyid gsum brjod pa las gzhan ba'i brjod pa thabs kyi man ngag la ltos pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gsum brjod pa las gzhan ba'i brjod pa thabs kyi man ngag la ltos pa med do zhe na /
translated: But apart from the statement of the three characteristics, there is no other statement that depends on the method of instruction.

original: mtshan nyid rtogs pa tsam gyis mtshan nyid gsum ston par shes na de nyid kyis gzhan gyi don gyi mtshan nyid shes pa de ni bden na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid rtogs pa tsam gyis mtshan nyid gsum ston par shes na de nyid kyis gzhan gyi don gyi mtshan nyid shes pa de ni bden na /
translated: If one knows the three characteristics merely by understanding the definition, then by that alone one knows the definition of the purpose for others. That is true.

original: de lta mod kyi mtshan nyid shes kyang de ston pa'i ngag gi rim pa mi shes pa'i byis pa la bstan pa'i thabs 'di'o //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi mtshan nyid shes kyang de ston pa'i ngag gi rim pa mi shes pa'i byis pa la bstan pa'i thabs 'di'o //
translated: However, even though one knows the definition, if one does not know the sequence of the words that teach it, then for the sake of the child one teaches the method of instruction.

original: khyab pa dang ldog pa med pa des med na mi 'byung ba ma smras pa'i phyir ston pa'i tshogs ma yin la /
analyzed: khyab pa dang ldog pa med pa des med na mi 'byung ba ma smras pa'i phyir ston pa'i tshogs ma yin la /
translated: Since one does not state the invariable concomitance and the reverse, it is not a collection of teachers.

original: de bzlas pa'i dpe dang bsgrub par bya ba dag bzlas te brjod pa'o //
analyzed: de bzlas pa'i dpe dang bsgrub par bya ba dag bzlas te brjod pa'o //
translated: The example and the probandum are repeated.

original: de dag ni dgos pa med pa'i phyir rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de dag ni dgos pa med pa'i phyir rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: Since they have no purpose, they are not stated.

original: 'bras bu brtags pas chad ma yang rtogs par nus pa'i phyir ma smos so //
analyzed: 'bras bu brtags pas chad ma yang rtogs par nus pa'i phyir ma smos so //
translated: Since the result can be understood by examining the reason, it is not mentioned.

original: don dang ji ltar 'brel zhe na /
analyzed: don dang ji ltar 'brel zhe na /
translated: How is the meaning related?

original: rang bzhin dang zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said: ‚Äúnature and effect.‚Äù

original: rang bzhin ni tha dad pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rang bzhin ni tha dad pa med pa'o //
translated: Nature is non-difference.

original: bdag nyid grub pas ni 'bras bu'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid grub pas ni 'bras bu'o //
translated: The effect is established by itself.

original: bdag nyid rgyu med na rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dag mi 'byung ba de bzhin du de dag med na de dag la skyes pa'i rtags shes pa med par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: bdag nyid rgyu med na rang bzhin dang 'bras bu dag mi 'byung ba de bzhin du de dag med na de dag la skyes pa'i rtags shes pa med par 'gyur bas /
translated: If there is no self-nature, then the nature and effect do not occur. Similarly, if they do not exist, then the sign of their arising would not exist.

original: @203a * // rtags shes pa des rab tu bskyed pa'i rjes su dpag ba ngo bo dang rgyu rtogs pa yang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @203a * // rtags shes pa des rab tu bskyed pa'i rjes su dpag ba ngo bo dang rgyu rtogs pa yang med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, the inference generated by that knowledge of the sign would not exist, and the understanding of the nature and cause would not exist.

original: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu med na mi 'byung ba blta par bya ba'i dngos po sngon po la sogs pa dang / mig dang / snang ba dang / yid la byed bdag ma tshang ba med par yod pa ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang 'bras bu med na mi 'byung ba blta par bya ba'i dngos po sngon po la sogs pa dang / mig dang / snang ba dang / yid la byed bdag ma tshang ba med par yod pa ste /
translated: The non-existence of nature and effect is the object to be seen, such as blue, and the non-deficiency of eye, light, and attention.

original: bsgrub par bya ba log pa bstan to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba log pa bstan to //
translated: The negation of the probandum is shown.

original: de mthong ba med par mi 'gyur te dmigs pa kho nar 'gyur ba'i phyir rtags mi 'byung bar bstan to //
analyzed: de mthong ba med par mi 'gyur te dmigs pa kho nar 'gyur ba'i phyir rtags mi 'byung bar bstan to //
translated: It is not that it is not seen, because it is only an object of perception. The sign is taught to be non-arisen.

original: de ltar brgyud de don dang 'brel ba'i dngos po rjes su dpag pa la so sor snang ba de nyid don rang gi mtshan nyid yin par ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar brgyud de don dang 'brel ba'i dngos po rjes su dpag pa la so sor snang ba de nyid don rang gi mtshan nyid yin par ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, in inference, which is related to the object through a succession, that which appears individually is not the object's own characteristic.

original: rjes su dpag pas gzung ba'i don de mngon sum la gsal ba don bya ba byed pa gzhan du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas gzung ba'i don de mngon sum la gsal ba don bya ba byed pa gzhan du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object grasped by inference appears as something else that is clearly perceived and performs a function.

original: rtags gang dag rang bzhin dang skye bas 'brel ba'i dngos po sngar bshad pa'i ji lta ba de 'dra ba'i rtags ni rtags shes pa'i blo'i rgyu yin la shes pa des skyed pa ni rtags can blo ste rjes su dpag pa'o //
analyzed: rtags gang dag rang bzhin dang skye bas 'brel ba'i dngos po sngar bshad pa'i ji lta ba de 'dra ba'i rtags ni rtags shes pa'i blo'i rgyu yin la shes pa des skyed pa ni rtags can blo ste rjes su dpag pa'o //
translated: The signs that are related to the object through essence and arising, as explained above, are the cause of the cognition that understands the sign. That which is produced by that cognition is the cognition that has the sign, which is inference.

original: de'i phyir ji bzhin dngos la ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir ji bzhin dngos la ste /
translated: Therefore, it is related to the object as it is.

original: 'brel pa ji lta ba'i dngos po la 'brel to //
analyzed: 'brel pa ji lta ba'i dngos po la 'brel to //
translated: It is related to the object in accordance with the relation.

original: dngos su 'am zhe na /
analyzed: dngos su 'am zhe na /
translated: Is it directly?

original: 'di ltar rtags can rtags blo dag / brgyud de dngos dang 'brel phyir ro //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: 'di ltar rtags can rtags blo dag / brgyud de dngos dang 'brel phyir ro // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus, the cognition of the sign and the sign itself are related indirectly, because they are related to the real thing.

original: 'brel ba de'i phyir slu bar byed pa min no //
analyzed: 'brel ba de'i phyir slu bar byed pa min no //
translated: Because of that relation, it is not deceptive.

original: 'o na 'khrul pa ji ltar rung zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na 'khrul pa ji ltar rung zhe na /
translated: But how can it be mistaken?

original: rjes su dpag pa de'i snang ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa de'i snang ba'o //
translated: It is a mistaken appearance of that inference.

original: yul de don rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa la /
analyzed: yul de don rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa la /
translated: The object is empty of the intrinsic identity of the referent.

original: de'i mtshan nyid du zhen pa las 'khrul par gzhag par byas te /
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid du zhen pa las 'khrul par gzhag par byas te /
translated: Mistaken is posited from the point of view of the adherence to its identity.

original: de la mi slu ba yang rnam par bslad pa'i sgo nas so //
analyzed: de la mi slu ba yang rnam par bslad pa'i sgo nas so //
translated: And it is nondeceptive in terms of the adulteration.

original: gal te bslad pa yin na ji ltar tshad mar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bslad pa yin na ji ltar tshad mar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But if it is adulterated, how can it be valid cognition?

original: rnam pa phyin ci log pas ldog pa'i shes par dbyer med kyang bye brag tu don byed pa las /üîΩji ltar rigs par nor bu 'thob pa'i don byed pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa phyin ci log pas ldog pa'i shes par dbyer med kyang bye brag tu don byed pa las / ji ltar rigs par nor bu 'thob pa'i don byed pa ni /
translated: Although the cognition is undifferentiated in terms of the erroneous form, it is differentiated in terms of the performance of its function.

original: yang dag par yin pa la cig shos ni log pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag par yin pa la cig shos ni log pa nyid do //
translated: The performance of the function of obtaining the jewel is correct, and the other is incorrect.

original: de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa dang de med pa dag kyang 'khrul bar bye brag med kyang /
analyzed: de bzhin du rjes su dpag pa dang de med pa dag kyang 'khrul bar bye brag med kyang /
translated: Similarly, although inference and its absence are undifferentiated in terms of error,

original: mthong ba'i don dang phrad pa'i don byed pa dang 'brel pas rjes su dpag pa tshad ma nyid du rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: mthong ba'i don dang phrad pa'i don byed pa dang 'brel pas rjes su dpag pa tshad ma nyid du rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The inference is established as valid knowledge because it is related to the object that is encountered and the object that is engaged.

original: don byed pa don du gnyer ba rnams kyis 'di gnyis bstan bcos la dpyad bar bya'o //üîΩji ltar rigs pa ni bde ba'i rgyu blang bar bya ba nyid dang / cig shos spang bar bya ba nyid du'o //
analyzed: don byed pa don du gnyer ba rnams kyis 'di gnyis bstan bcos la dpyad bar bya'o // ji ltar rigs pa ni bde ba'i rgyu blang bar bya ba nyid dang / cig shos spang bar bya ba nyid du'o //
translated: Those who seek to engage in the object should examine these two in the treatises.üîΩThe two are to be understood as the cause of happiness and the cause of suffering, respectively.

original: nye bar gzhag @203b pa ni rtogs par ro //
analyzed: nye bar gzhag @203b pa ni rtogs par ro //
translated: The two are to be understood as the cause of happiness and the cause of suffering, respectively.

original: de dag gi rgyu tshad ma cung zad yongs su brtag pa'i rtog pa dang ldan pa mkhas pa ni ;
analyzed: de dag gi rgyu tshad ma cung zad yongs su brtag pa'i rtog pa dang ldan pa mkhas pa ni ;
translated: The wise, who have a little understanding of the cause of valid knowledge,

original: 'bad pa 'bras bu med pa la sogs pas nyon mongs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'bad pa 'bras bu med pa la sogs pas nyon mongs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: will not be troubled by the futility of effort, etc.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa'i yul gyis don bya ba sgrub pa nyid ma yin pas na ji ltar de brtag par bya ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa'i yul gyis don bya ba sgrub pa nyid ma yin pas na ji ltar de brtag par bya ba yin zhe na /
translated: If the object of inference is not established as the object of engagement, how can it be examined?

original: rjes su dpag pa so sor snang ba zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa so sor snang ba zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The text says, ‚ÄúThe object of inference is a conceptual image.‚Äù

original: de ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul spyi yin la /
analyzed: de ni rnam par rtog pa'i yul spyi yin la /
translated: That is the object of conceptual thought, a universal.

original: de la yang don byed ba'i dngos po 'gags kyang spyi de mi 'gag pa'i phyir don byed pa'i dngos po nyid so so ma yin no //
analyzed: de la yang don byed ba'i dngos po 'gags kyang spyi de mi 'gag pa'i phyir don byed pa'i dngos po nyid so so ma yin no //
translated: And in that case, even though the entity that performs the function has ceased, the universal does not cease, so the entity that performs the function is not individual.

original: gal te de ltar na spyi khas len tam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de ltar na spyi khas len tam zhe na /
translated: If it is like that, is the universal accepted?

original: des zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: des zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBy that.‚Äù

original: don grub par med pas des na'o //
analyzed: don grub par med pas des na'o //
translated: Since the object is accomplished, it is by that.

original: spyi ni yod kyang kun rdzob nyid yin gyi don dam ba'i don nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi ni yod kyang kun rdzob nyid yin gyi don dam ba'i don nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: The universal exists, but it is only conventional, not the ultimate object itself.

original: gal te de nyid kyi phyir rjes su dpag pa tshad mar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de nyid kyi phyir rjes su dpag pa tshad mar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is just because of that, then inference is not valid knowledge?

original: dngos po mtshan nyid la zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: dngos po mtshan nyid la zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIn the characteristic of an entity.‚Äù

original: mi slu ba yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: mi slu ba yang ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is it nondeceptive?

original: yang de dang 'brel pa'i rtags zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: yang de dang 'brel pa'i rtags zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: He says, ‚ÄúAlso, the sign that is related to that.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir mi slu ba nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir mi slu ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it is nondeceptive.

original: yang na de ltar rjes su dpag pa'i so sor snang ba dang mi slu ba'i yul gnyis su bstan to //
analyzed: yang na de ltar rjes su dpag pa'i so sor snang ba dang mi slu ba'i yul gnyis su bstan to //
translated: Or, in that way, the individual appearance of inference and the nondeceptive object are shown to be two.

original: yang don de gnyis su slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos kyang bstan to zhes bstan pa'i phyir yang de dang 'brel ba'i zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: yang don de gnyis su slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos kyang bstan to zhes bstan pa'i phyir yang de dang 'brel ba'i zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In order to demonstrate this, he says, ‚ÄúIn connection with that,‚Äù etc.

original: don byed pa sgrub pa de dang 'brel pa'i rtags kyis bskyed pa'i snang ba ni rtags kyi dngos po ste /
analyzed: don byed pa sgrub pa de dang 'brel pa'i rtags kyis bskyed pa'i snang ba ni rtags kyi dngos po ste /
translated: The appearance generated by the evidence in connection with the establishment of the performance of an object is the evidence.

original: 'bras bu la rgyu nye bar btags nas /
analyzed: 'bras bu la rgyu nye bar btags nas /
translated: The effect is figuratively designated as the cause.

original: rjes su dpag pa la so sor snang ba'i yul la bya'o //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la so sor snang ba'i yul la bya'o //
translated: It is the object that appears to inference.

original: de la ltos te slob dpon gyis kyang don dbye ste /
analyzed: de la ltos te slob dpon gyis kyang don dbye ste /
translated: In connection with that, the master also divided the object.

original: yul gyi dbye ba gsungs she na'o //
analyzed: yul gyi dbye ba gsungs she na'o //
translated: He taught the division of the object.

original: zhe'o zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi tshig yin par ston pa'o //
analyzed: zhe'o zhes bya ba ni slob dpon gyi tshig yin par ston pa'o //
translated: ‚Äú In that way‚Äù shows that the words are those of the master.

original: bye brag med pa ni gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: bye brag med pa ni gcig pa nyid do //
translated: Non-difference is identity.

original: de dgag pa ni gcig pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de dgag pa ni gcig pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The negation of that is non-identity.

original: de ltar na rjes su dpag pa dang mngon sum gyi so sor snang ba'i yul dag gcig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar na rjes su dpag pa dang mngon sum gyi so sor snang ba'i yul dag gcig pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the objects that appear to inference and perception are not identical,

original: dngos po dang dngos po med pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: dngos po dang dngos po med pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba yin gyi /
translated: because they are, respectively, a non-entity and an entity.

original: de dag so sor snang ba'i yul mang ba ste /
analyzed: de dag so sor snang ba'i yul mang ba ste /
translated: The objects of those are many, individually.

original: dngos po gnyis su bstan pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po gnyis su bstan pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not taught that there are two things,

original: mang po nyid du bsgrub pa ni dngos po'i yul ma yin na /
analyzed: mang po nyid du bsgrub pa ni dngos po'i yul ma yin na /
translated: because the establishment of many is not the object of a thing,

original: rjes su dpag ba rnam par rtog pa'i so sor snang ba ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgal te rnam par rtog pa'i yul spyi yin pa'i phyir yul @204a * //
analyzed: rjes su dpag ba rnam par rtog pa'i so sor snang ba ni dngos po med pa'i phyir ro // gal te rnam par rtog pa'i yul spyi yin pa'i phyir yul @204a * //
translated: because the object of inference is the individual appearance of conceptual thought, and because it is not a thing.

original: gnyis yod do zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis yod do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there are two objects because the object of conceptual thought is a universal,

original: spyi yang dngos po las gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi yang dngos po las gzhan nyid du brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: then a universal is not something that can be said to be different from a thing,

original: gzhan nyid ni dngos po'i yul la yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan nyid ni dngos po'i yul la yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because difference is the object of a thing.

original: gang zhig bsregs pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i don me shes par 'dod pa la me de las bzlog pa ma yin pa las bzlog pa de me tsam mo //
analyzed: gang zhig bsregs pa'i dgos pa dang ldan pa'i don me shes par 'dod pa la me de las bzlog pa ma yin pa las bzlog pa de me tsam mo //
translated: For one who desires to know fire for the purpose of burning, that which is not other than fire is just fire.

original: de las zhes bya ba rtags las so //
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba rtags las so //
translated: From that means from the reason.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bye brag so sor mi 'dzin bas so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bye brag so sor mi 'dzin bas so //
translated: Because it does not apprehend the individual differences of its own characteristics.

original: smig rgyu la chu bzhin du dngos po yod pa shin tu ring ba ste /
analyzed: smig rgyu la chu bzhin du dngos po yod pa shin tu ring ba ste /
translated: Like a mirage, it is very far from being an existent entity.

original: brgyud pas kyang ma 'brel pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brgyud pas kyang ma 'brel pas ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that it is not connected by a causal process.

original: rtags rtogs pa'i blo yang du ma spyi'i yul can ni yin pa'o //
analyzed: rtags rtogs pa'i blo yang du ma spyi'i yul can ni yin pa'o //
translated: The cognition that understands the reason has a manifold universal for its object.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rtags ni rjes su 'gro ba la brten pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rtags ni rjes su 'gro ba la brten pa'i phyir /
translated: Because the reason is based on the universal.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid la ni rjes su 'gro ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid la ni rjes su 'gro ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is impossible for a universal to exist in a particular.

original: cig shos ni zhes pa ni mngon sum mo //
analyzed: cig shos ni zhes pa ni mngon sum mo //
translated: The other is perception.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni rang gi yul las gzhan brtags bsams pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni rang gi yul las gzhan brtags bsams pa'o //
translated: Also means that it is imagined or inferred, which are different from its own object.

original: des mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rtags des rang gi mtshan nyid ston par ro //
analyzed: des mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni rtags des rang gi mtshan nyid ston par ro //
translated: Because it is not able to do that means that that reason does not indicate the particular.

original: tshig le'ur byas pa'i cha rtags las don mthong ba'o zhes bya ba bshad nas /
analyzed: tshig le'ur byas pa'i cha rtags las don mthong ba'o zhes bya ba bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the part of the verse that says ‚Äúthe object is seen from the reason,‚Äù

original: tshul gsum zhes bya ba cha snga ma bshad par bzhed pas /
analyzed: tshul gsum zhes bya ba cha snga ma bshad par bzhed pas /
translated: in order to explain the former part that says ‚Äúthe triply characterized,‚Äù

original: tshul gsum po de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: tshul gsum po de yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: he says ‚Äúthat triply characterized,‚Äù and so on.

original: nges pa mtha'i tshig 'di ni snga ma gnyis la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: nges pa mtha'i tshig 'di ni snga ma gnyis la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúin the final analysis‚Äù should be applied to the previous two definitions as well.

original: 'dir zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du byed pa'i dus dang khyab pa rtogs par byed pa'i dus dag spong bas gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid byed pa'i dus 'dir ro zhes bya bar ston to //
analyzed: 'dir zhes bya ba ni tha snyad du byed pa'i dus dang khyab pa rtogs par byed pa'i dus dag spong bas gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid byed pa'i dus 'dir ro zhes bya bar ston to //
translated: Here means in the context of the definition of a reason, which excludes the context of conventional usage and the context of establishing pervasion.

original: 'dir yang rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don gtso bo ni chos can dang sgrub par 'dod pa'i chos sdom pa yin pas de nyid gzung na rtags dgos pa med pa zhig gis mtshan nyid du bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'dir yang rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don gtso bo ni chos can dang sgrub par 'dod pa'i chos sdom pa yin pas de nyid gzung na rtags dgos pa med pa zhig gis mtshan nyid du bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: Here, the primary meaning of the term ‚Äúinference‚Äù is the combination of the subject and the property to be proven. Therefore, if that is taken to be the definition, then the reason would be pointless.

original: bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa la yod pa zhes pa smras pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa la yod pa zhes pa smras pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is said that the reason is that which exists in that which is to be proven.

original: rtags rjes su dpag pas bzung ba'i dpyod pa pa dag la sgra la byas pa nyid rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa can nyid kyis sgrub pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rtags rjes su dpag pas bzung ba'i dpyod pa pa dag la sgra la byas pa nyid rkyen gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa can nyid kyis sgrub pa lta bu'o //
translated: For the Mƒ´mƒÅ·πÉsakas, who hold that the reason is grasped by inference, the property of being produced is established by the difference in conditions, as in the case of sound.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba la yod pa nyid tshad mas grub pa yin pa de bzhin du de dang mthun pa nyid la yang ngo //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba la yod pa nyid tshad mas grub pa yin pa de bzhin du de dang mthun pa nyid la yang ngo //
translated: Just as the existence of the object of inference is established by a means of valid knowledge, so too is its conformity.

original: rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid la yod pa zhe na ni chos can bye brag can gyi chos su bstan pas gzhan mthun pa'i phyogs su 'jug par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya ba nyid la yod pa zhe na ni chos can bye brag can gyi chos su bstan pas gzhan mthun pa'i phyogs su 'jug par mi 'gyur la /
translated: If the existence of the object of inference is meant, then since the property of a specific subject is taught, it would not apply to other similar instances.

original: gal te rjes su dpag par bya ba kho na'i chos zhes ma smras na /
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag par bya ba kho na'i chos zhes ma smras na /
translated: If it is not said that it is the property of only the object of inference,

original: @204b yang de'i chos sam gzhan gyi chos kyang rung zhes bya bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: @204b yang de'i chos sam gzhan gyi chos kyang rung zhes bya bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: then it would be either the property of that or the property of another.

original: rjes su dpag bar bya ba'i chos nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag bar bya ba'i chos nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: It would not be the property of the object of inference.

original: mi ldan pa dang / gzhan dang ldan pa dang / gtan mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa zhes bya ba'i bye brag gis chos kyi yod pa dang med pa rnam par gcod pa'o //üîΩldog bar byed ba sti ;
analyzed: mi ldan pa dang / gzhan dang ldan pa dang / gtan mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa zhes bya ba'i bye brag gis chos kyi yod pa dang med pa rnam par gcod pa'o // ldog bar byed ba sti ;
translated: The existence and nonexistence of a property are distinguished by the distinctions of nonpossession, possession of another, and complete nonpossession.

original: rnam par gcod pa sgrub pa'i'o //
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa sgrub pa'i'o //
translated: The exclusion of the non-object of inference is the object of inference.üîΩThe exclusion of the non-object of inference is the object of inference.

original: tshig gi phrad ni 'dir nges par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: tshig gi phrad ni 'dir nges par gzung ba'o //
translated: The particle here has the sense of restriction.

original: ldog par byed pa yang yin la tshig gi phrad kyang yin pas ldog par byed pa'i tshig phrad do //
analyzed: ldog par byed pa yang yin la tshig gi phrad kyang yin pas ldog par byed pa'i tshig phrad do //
translated: It is a prefix and it is a particle, thus it is a prefix particle.

original: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: go rims bzhin du mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i tshig gi phrad ni bye brag tu byed pa dang lhan cig brjod pa ste /
analyzed: go rims bzhin du mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa'i tshig gi phrad ni bye brag tu byed pa dang lhan cig brjod pa ste /
translated: In order, the prefix particles that exclude non-possession are those that express distinction and those that express togetherness.

original: de la yod pa kho na zhes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de la yod pa kho na zhes pa lta bu'o //
translated: Among them, the prefix particle eva is like ‚Äúonly.‚Äù

original: 'di nyid 'og nas ston to //
analyzed: 'di nyid 'og nas ston to //
translated: This is taught below.

original: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ni bye brag tu bya ba dang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ni bye brag tu bya ba dang ngo //
translated: The prefix particles that exclude possession of something else are those that express distinction.

original: gtan mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ni bya ba dang lhan cig brjod pa'o //
analyzed: gtan mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pa ni bya ba dang lhan cig brjod pa'o //
translated: The prefix particles that exclude complete non-possession are those that express action and those that express togetherness.

original: gal te 'dir tshig le'ur byas par nges par gzung ba ma smos na ji ltar nges par bya zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'dir tshig le'ur byas par nges par gzung ba ma smos na ji ltar nges par bya zhe na /
translated: If the term ‚Äúdefinite‚Äù is not mentioned in the present metrical version, how is it to be ascertained?

original: nges par gzung bar brjod par 'dod pa yin la /
analyzed: nges par gzung bar brjod par 'dod pa yin la /
translated: It is asserted that definite is expressed.

original: nges par gzung ba'i sgra ma sbyar kyang nges par gzung ba'i don de rtogs par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: nges par gzung ba'i sgra ma sbyar kyang nges par gzung ba'i don de rtogs par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Even though the term definite is not applied, the meaning of definite is understood.

original: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
analyzed: ci'i phyir snyam pa la /
translated: Why is that?

original: rnam par gcod pa zhes bya ba nges par gzung ba dag gi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa zhes bya ba nges par gzung ba dag gi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the result of the words ‚Äúonly‚Äù and ‚Äúalone‚Äù is the exclusion of other.

original: ji ltar nag pa gzhu 'dzin zhes smra na /
analyzed: ji ltar nag pa gzhu 'dzin zhes smra na /
translated: For example, when one says ‚ÄúDevadatta holds the bow,‚Äù

original: nges par gzung ba'i sgra ma sbyar kyang /
analyzed: nges par gzung ba'i sgra ma sbyar kyang /
translated: even though the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is not applied,üîΩthe meaning is understood as ‚ÄúDevadatta holds only the bow,‚Äù

original: nag pa gzhu 'dzin ba kho na'o zhes bye brag tu byed pa gzhu 'dzin pa dang / tshig phrad pa'i don du go'i /üîΩgzhan du gzhu kho na'o zhe 'am /
analyzed: nag pa gzhu 'dzin ba kho na'o zhes bye brag tu byed pa gzhu 'dzin pa dang / tshig phrad pa'i don du go'i / gzhan du gzhu kho na'o zhe 'am /
translated: and the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is understood as the meaning of the compound.

original: nag pa kho na zhes ni ma yin no //
analyzed: nag pa kho na zhes ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not understood as ‚Äúonly the bow‚ÄùüîΩor ‚Äúonly Devadatta.‚ÄùüîΩSimilarly, when one says ‚ÄúArjuna holds the bow,‚ÄùüîΩeven though the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is not applied, the meaning is understood as ‚ÄúArjuna alone holds the bow,‚Äù

original: srid sgrub gzhu 'dzin zhes nges par gzung ba'i sgra med par smras kyang srid sgrub kho na gzhu 'dzin no zhes bye brag tu bya ba srid sgrub dang tshig phrad sbyar ba'i don du'o //üîΩgzhu 'dzin pa kho na zhe 'am /
analyzed: srid sgrub gzhu 'dzin zhes nges par gzung ba'i sgra med par smras kyang srid sgrub kho na gzhu 'dzin no zhes bye brag tu bya ba srid sgrub dang tshig phrad sbyar ba'i don du'o // gzhu 'dzin pa kho na zhe 'am /
translated: and the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is understood as the meaning of the compound.üîΩBut it is not understood as ‚Äúonly the bow‚Äù

original: gzhu kho na zhes ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhu kho na zhes ni ma yin no //
translated: or ‚Äúonly Arjuna.‚Äù

original: sngon po mtsho skyes zhes smras na /
analyzed: sngon po mtsho skyes zhes smras na /
translated: For example, when one says ‚Äúthe blue lotus,‚Äù

original: sngon po mtsho skyes yin pa kho na'o zhes dngos po tsam dang 'brel ba dang / tshig phrad sbyar bar go'i /üîΩsngon po kho na mtsho skyes she'am /
analyzed: sngon po mtsho skyes yin pa kho na'o zhes dngos po tsam dang 'brel ba dang / tshig phrad sbyar bar go'i / sngon po kho na mtsho skyes she'am /
translated: The first two are like saying the blue is the lotus and the lotus is the blue, which are related to the mere thing.

original: mtsho skyes kho na sngon po zhes ni ma yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: mtsho skyes kho na sngon po zhes ni ma yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: The third is like saying the blue is the only lotus or the lotus is the only blue.

original: de la snga ma gnyis ni chos dang chos can gyi bye brag sems pas so //
analyzed: de la snga ma gnyis ni chos dang chos can gyi bye brag sems pas so //
translated: Among these, the first two are due to thinking of the distinction between the property and the basis of the property.

original: gsum pa ni dngos po tsam zhig sems pa ste /üîΩmtsho skyes sngon po mi srid do zhes zer ba la /
analyzed: gsum pa ni dngos po tsam zhig sems pa ste / mtsho skyes sngon po mi srid do zhes zer ba la /
translated: The third is due to thinking of the mere thing.

original: @205a * // mtsho skyes sngon bo zhes bya ba srid pa nyid ces gtan med bar 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: @205a * // mtsho skyes sngon bo zhes bya ba srid pa nyid ces gtan med bar 'gog pa'o //
translated: It is like saying the blue lotus is impossible, and then saying the blue lotus is possible.

original: de ltar na nag ba gzhu 'dzin nam mi 'dzin snyam pa la /
analyzed: de ltar na nag ba gzhu 'dzin nam mi 'dzin snyam pa la /
translated: In this way, when one wonders does the dark one hold the bow or not?

original: nag ba gzhu 'dzin zhes smras pas gzhu 'dzin pa nyid ces bya ba'i don du go bar bya ste /
analyzed: nag ba gzhu 'dzin zhes smras pas gzhu 'dzin pa nyid ces bya ba'i don du go bar bya ste /
translated: by saying the dark one holds the bow, one understands the meaning of he holds the bow.

original: gal te mi 'dzin ba yang srid par 'gyur na ngag de don med de the tshom bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te mi 'dzin ba yang srid par 'gyur na ngag de don med de the tshom bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were possible that he does not hold it, that statement would be meaningless because it would teach doubt.

original: de bzhin du srid sgrub gzhu 'dzin bar grub ba de dang 'dra bar gzhu 'dzin ba yod dam snyam pa la /
analyzed: de bzhin du srid sgrub gzhu 'dzin bar grub ba de dang 'dra bar gzhu 'dzin ba yod dam snyam pa la /
translated: If you think that the bow-wielding is like the bow-wielding of Arjuna,

original: srid sgrub gzhu 'dzin ces smras bas srid sgrub kho na zhes go bar bya ste /
analyzed: srid sgrub gzhu 'dzin ces smras bas srid sgrub kho na zhes go bar bya ste /
translated: then the phrase ‚ÄúArjuna wields the bow‚Äù is understood to mean ‚ÄúArjuna alone wields the bow.‚Äù

original: de lta ma yin na gzhan yang 'dzin pa srid pa yin na ngag de don med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gzhan yang 'dzin pa srid pa yin na ngag de don med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were not so, then since it would be possible for others to wield the bow, the statement would be meaningless.

original: mtsho skyes sngon po srid dam mi srid snyam pa la /
analyzed: mtsho skyes sngon po srid dam mi srid snyam pa la /
translated: If you think that it is possible or impossible for the blue lotus to exist,

original: sngon po mtsho skyes so zhes smra na /
analyzed: sngon po mtsho skyes so zhes smra na /
translated: then if you say ‚ÄúThe blue lotus,‚Äù

original: sngon po mtsho skyes srid pa nyid do zhes bo khar bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: sngon po mtsho skyes srid pa nyid do zhes bo khar bya ba yin gyi /
translated: you should say ‚ÄúThe blue lotus is possible.‚Äù

original: mi srid ba yang ston pa srid na ni ngag de don med do //
analyzed: mi srid ba yang ston pa srid na ni ngag de don med do //
translated: If you say that it is possible to show that it is impossible, then the statement would be meaningless.

original: de'i phyir 'dir nges par gzung ba ma smos kyang der go ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir nges par gzung ba ma smos kyang der go ste /
translated: Therefore, although the definite description is not stated here, it is understood.

original: ngag gi 'bras bu nges par gzung ba med na ngag don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngag gi 'bras bu nges par gzung ba med na ngag don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the statement would be meaningless if the definite description of the result of the statement were not stated.

original: gal te de ltar nges par gzung bar ni go bar 'gyur na srid sgrub gzhu 'dzin zhes bya bas mi ldan pa /
analyzed: gal te de ltar nges par gzung bar ni go bar 'gyur na srid sgrub gzhu 'dzin zhes bya bas mi ldan pa /
translated: If it is understood that it is definitely so, then the statement ‚ÄúSatyaki holds a bow‚Äù would be an exclusion of what is not so.

original: rnam par gcod pa kho nar 'gyur ba dang / gnyis pa gzhan dang ldan pa dang gsum pas gtan mi ldan pa kho nar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par gcod pa kho nar 'gyur ba dang / gnyis pa gzhan dang ldan pa dang gsum pas gtan mi ldan pa kho nar ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How could the second statement ‚ÄúHe holds something else‚Äù and the third statement ‚ÄúHe definitely does not hold anything‚Äù be understood?

original: de la'ang 'gal ba gzhan gcod pa'i //
analyzed: de la'ang 'gal ba gzhan gcod pa'i //
translated: The meaning of the exclusion of other

original: don de rtogs par 'gyur ba ste //
analyzed: don de rtogs par 'gyur ba ste //
translated: is understood in that way.

original: brjod par bya ba dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba dang 'gal ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is contradictory to what is to be expressed,

original: de kho na dag gcod pa'i don der go bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de kho na dag gcod pa'i don der go bar 'gyur ro //
translated: the meaning of the exclusion of other is understood in that way.

original: gal te de dag kho na ltar 'gal ba yang ji ltar shes she na /
analyzed: gal te de dag kho na ltar 'gal ba yang ji ltar shes she na /
translated: If it is contradictory in that way, how is it known?

original: de ltar grags bas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de ltar grags bas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause of being renowned in that way‚Äù is stated.

original: gzhan gzhu 'dzin par grags la /
analyzed: gzhan gzhu 'dzin par grags la /
translated: It is renowned that others hold a bow.

original: nag pa la ni the tshom za ba'i nyan pa po'i skabs kyis dang / srid sgrub gzhu 'dzin par grags la /
analyzed: nag pa la ni the tshom za ba'i nyan pa po'i skabs kyis dang / srid sgrub gzhu 'dzin par grags la /
translated: In the context of the listener who doubts whether it is black, it is renowned that Satyaki holds a bow.

original: de dang 'dra ba gzhan la the tshom za ba dang / mtsho skyes sngon po srid dam mi srid snyam pa'i skabs kyis de dag kho na 'gal ba yin ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba gzhan la the tshom za ba dang / mtsho skyes sngon po srid dam mi srid snyam pa'i skabs kyis de dag kho na 'gal ba yin ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The same is true of the other two alternatives, since they are contradictory.

original: 'o na nges par gzung ba ci'i phyir ma sbyar zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na nges par gzung ba ci'i phyir ma sbyar zhe na /
translated: Why is the term ‚Äúonly‚Äù not applied in the first alternative?

original: sgra ni rjod par 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir bsdus te rjod par 'dod pas so //
analyzed: sgra ni rjod par 'dod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir bsdus te rjod par 'dod pas so //
translated: Because the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is used to exclude what is not intended, and what is intended is included.

original: des na 'dir yang rjes su dpag par bya ba ni yod pa nyid ces mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pas bye brag tu byed pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon yod ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'dir yang rjes su dpag par bya ba ni yod pa nyid ces mi ldan pa rnam par gcod pas bye brag tu byed pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i skyon yod ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù excludes what is not intended, namely, nonexistence, there is no fault of the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù being meaningless.

original: gal te gzhan dang ldan @205b ba rnam par gcod pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gzhan dang ldan @205b ba rnam par gcod pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how does the word ‚Äúonly‚Äù exclude what is not intended, namely, existence?

original: tshig gi phrad ba gnyis pa gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: tshig gi phrad ba gnyis pa gzhan dang ldan pa rnam par gcod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because the second phrase, ‚Äúonly,‚Äù excludes what is not intended, namely, existence.

original: rjes dpag bya ba'ang de mtshungs la //
analyzed: rjes dpag bya ba'ang de mtshungs la //
translated: The object of inference is the same.

original: yod dang med nyid la med nyid //
analyzed: yod dang med nyid la med nyid //
translated: Existence and nonexistence are not the same.

original: ces gzhan mthun ba'i phyogs med pa la ldan ba rnam par gcod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces gzhan mthun ba'i phyogs med pa la ldan ba rnam par gcod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, it is because of the exclusion of the possession of the absence of other concordant factors.üîΩüîΩ

original: de nyid kyi phyir tshig phrad dang po ni gzhan dang ldan pa gcod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir tshig phrad dang po ni gzhan dang ldan pa gcod pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the first case ending is not a negation of possession of something else,

original: rang dang gzhan la yang yod bar ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang dang gzhan la yang yod bar ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it indicates that something exists in itself and in something else.

original: gal te de lta ma yin na khyad bar du byed pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gi phrad dang po dang / khyad par du bya ba dang ldan pa'i tshig gi phrad gnyis pa dag bye brag med par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te de lta ma yin na khyad bar du byed pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gi phrad dang po dang / khyad par du bya ba dang ldan pa'i tshig gi phrad gnyis pa dag bye brag med par 'gyur na /
translated: If that were not so, then the first case ending, which is used to indicate possession of something else, and the second case ending, which is used to indicate possession of something else, would be indistinguishable.

original: de ltar ma yin te ;
analyzed: de ltar ma yin te ;
translated: But that is not so,

original: dang po ni gzhan dang ldan par smra ba'i phyir dang / gnyis pa ni gzhan dang ldan pa 'gog par ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dang po ni gzhan dang ldan par smra ba'i phyir dang / gnyis pa ni gzhan dang ldan pa 'gog par ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the first case ending is used to indicate possession of something else, and the second case ending is used to indicate the negation of possession of something else.

original: ngag gi 'bras bu nges par gzung ba yin pa des na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la sgrub par 'dod pa'i chos yod pa yang bye brag tu bya ba dang / bye brag tu byed pa'i dngos po go bar bya ste ;
analyzed: ngag gi 'bras bu nges par gzung ba yin pa des na bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la sgrub par 'dod pa'i chos yod pa yang bye brag tu bya ba dang / bye brag tu byed pa'i dngos po go bar bya ste ;
translated: Therefore, the existence of the property to be established in the subject is to be specified, and the thing that specifies is the reason.

original: 'di la sgrub par 'dod pa'i chos yod pa nyid do zhes bye brag tu byed pa dang lhan cig brjod bar ro //üîΩma 'brel pa tsam bcad ba des na bye brag tu byed pa ste nges par gzung ba yod kyang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di la sgrub par 'dod pa'i chos yod pa nyid do zhes bye brag tu byed pa dang lhan cig brjod bar ro // ma 'brel pa tsam bcad ba des na bye brag tu byed pa ste nges par gzung ba yod kyang mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba med par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, the existence of the property to be established is specified, and it is stated together with the specification.üîΩSince it is merely the disjunction of non-connection that is specified, even though there is a specification, or ascertainment, it is not the case that there is no pervasion because it exists in the similar class.

original: mi ldan ba rnam par gcod ba de nyid kyi phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa tsam gyis spyi yin yang rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba grub pa yang ma yin te //
analyzed: mi ldan ba rnam par gcod ba de nyid kyi phyir rjes su 'gro ba med pa tsam gyis spyi yin yang rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa mi 'grub pa'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba grub pa yang ma yin te //
translated: Because of that very disjunction of non-possession, even though it is a universal due to mere non-pervasion, it is not established as the probandum because the realization of pervasion is not established.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de dang mi ldan pa rnam par gcod ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i chos de dang mi ldan pa rnam par gcod ba ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the exclusion of the non-possession of the property to be established is not established.

original: rjes su dpag bar bya ba la'ang /
analyzed: rjes su dpag bar bya ba la'ang /
translated: In the case of inference for others,

original: de mtshungs la'ang zhes bsdu ba byas nas so //
analyzed: de mtshungs la'ang zhes bsdu ba byas nas so //
translated: the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is added to the statement of the reason.

original: de lta ma yin na bsdu ba'i sgra don med bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na bsdu ba'i sgra don med bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù would be meaningless.

original: ji ltar drang srong rgyas pas bshad pa stobs bzangs dang yang khyab 'jug nyid ces bya ba lta bu ste /
analyzed: ji ltar drang srong rgyas pas bshad pa stobs bzangs dang yang khyab 'jug nyid ces bya ba lta bu ste /
translated: For example, in the statement ‚ÄúVi·π£·πáu is also the ·πõ·π£i VƒÅmana,‚Äù

original: 'di ni pha rol la grub pa dper brjod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni pha rol la grub pa dper brjod pa'o //
translated: this is an example of a reason that is established for the other party.

original: de las khyab 'jug nyid ces smos kyang stobs bzangs nor lha'i bu yin ba nyid mi gcod de bsdu ba'i sgras so zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: de las khyab 'jug nyid ces smos kyang stobs bzangs nor lha'i bu yin ba nyid mi gcod de bsdu ba'i sgras so zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: Even though the word ‚Äúalso‚Äù is used, it does not exclude the fact that VƒÅmana is the son of the god of wealth, because of the word ‚Äúalso.‚Äù

original: rgyu dang rang bzhin gzung bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: rgyu dang rang bzhin gzung bar bya ba ste /
translated: The cause and the nature are to be apprehended.

original: dmigs su rung ba'i yul dmigs pas ldog pa 'grub kyi 'brel ba las gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhes brjod do //
analyzed: dmigs su rung ba'i yul dmigs pas ldog pa 'grub kyi 'brel ba las gzhan gyis ni ma yin zhes brjod do //
translated: It is said that the negation of the object of apprehension is established by the apprehension of the object that is suitable to be apprehended, and not by anything else.

original: mi dmigs pa yang bsgrub par bya ba med pa'i tha snyad du rung ba log na mngon sum 'jug pa'i phyir @206a * //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa yang bsgrub par bya ba med pa'i tha snyad du rung ba log na mngon sum 'jug pa'i phyir @206a * //
translated: and non-observation is suitable as a verbal expression of the non-existence of the object of attainment, because direct perception does not engage when it is absent.

original: gtan tshigs mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs mi 'byung ste /
translated: Therefore, the reason is not produced.

original: med pa'i tha snyang du dung ba ni dmigs par regs pa mi dmigs pa la de yod de yod pa'i 'brel pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa'i tha snyang du dung ba ni dmigs par regs pa mi dmigs pa la de yod de yod pa'i 'brel pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The verbal expression of non-existence is in the non-observation of the observation of the object of attainment, because it is related to existence.

original: gal te mthun pa nyid la yod pa zhes smos pa nyid kyis ldog pa rtogs pa'i phyir med pa nyid la med pa nyid ces smos pa dgos pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mthun pa nyid la yod pa zhes smos pa nyid kyis ldog pa rtogs pa'i phyir med pa nyid la med pa nyid ces smos pa dgos pa med do zhe na /
translated: If one says that the expression of existence itself, by the expression of the similar, realizes the dissimilar, and therefore the expression of non-existence in non-existence is unnecessary,

original: med pa la med pa nyid gtan tshigs yin gyi /
analyzed: med pa la med pa nyid gtan tshigs yin gyi /
translated: non-existence is the reason of non-existence.

original: gzhan pa la yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan pa la yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not the other,

original: 'di ltar gzhan pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos las gzhan dang ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar gzhan pa ni bsgrub par bya ba'i chos las gzhan dang ldan pa yin la /
translated: because the other is that which possesses the property of being other than the property of the probandum.

original: de lta na ni phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs dag kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na ni phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyogs dag kyang mi mthun pa'i phyogs su 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, the similar class would be the dissimilar class.

original: de dag kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos las gzhan rngo dang rtsva dag la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang bsgrub par bya ba'i chos las gzhan rngo dang rtsva dag la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are endowed with other things to be accomplished, such as the fuel and grass, etc.

original: des na de dag la med pa rtags kyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na de dag la med pa rtags kyi mtshan nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, non-existence would be the definition of the reason.

original: 'gal ba la med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba la med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it non-existence in the contradictory,

original: 'di ltar 'gal ba la med pas zhes bya bas ni bsal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'gal ba la med pas zhes bya bas ni bsal bar 'gyur te /
